posts.post_title: Lot #44 T205 Brockelman and Luckey Auction
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Matt E.
If the winner of Brockelman & Luckey Auction lot #44 does not plan on keeping all the T205's, Please contact Turner or myself. We would be interested in purchasing a few for our T205 set. Currently on vacation and will not be able to check home email until Monday evening. Feel free to post here if this may work for you. 

Thanks, 
Matt and Turner
